title: - Cannot click to open the shop, but can press 'P'
body: But when i log in with my friend's account, I can open it. So its not my computer problem.

replies.body: i cannot find the file named game.cfg and persistedsettings.json

The issue may not necessarily be with your computer, but your config settings could be corrupt and unresponsive to certain commands or interface use.  I suggest setting your config to see if that might help.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if it works for you.
